title: Im curious, will Jhin's story ever get it's fourth and final part?

embed.description: In the wake of war between Noxus and Ionia, Riven is accused of a heinous crime.

body: I just finished reading the continuation for Riven and Yasuo's story and it was honestly amazing. This reminded me of how Jhin's story never got its fourth and final piece yet, and how awesome it would be if they did something similar with it, along with more beautiful artworks like the ones they did for Riven and Yasuo. Will we get more of Jhin's story soon? Maybe the ninjas as well?
